data.eml:eml: A description of a new genus and new species of sotol-feeding Eccritotarsini (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Bryocorinae) from Durango, Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Menard, K. L., Schwartz, M. D. (2018): A description of a new genus and new species of sotol-feeding Eccritotarsini (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Bryocorinae) from Durango, Mexico. Zootaxa 4514 (2): 283-292, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4514.2.11
